topic.title: How to Mark the Content inside the Publication

body.p: In DITA we can mark some part of the content as flags to bring their contents to light. This content is filtered using a ditaval file attached to the DITA map.
For example to add a change bar on a content we can use the following:<val> <revprop action="flag" changebar="color:blue;style:solid;width:2pt;offset:1.25mm;placement:start" val="new"/> </val>
Each content marked with rev="new" will have a blue change bar on it.
